title: Cine Clips for Cineworks (RISC OS)

        |   ================================================================   |
        |                            Description                               |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   This CD contains various sample clips for use with Oregan's        |
        |   CineWorks package, designed to get you started with exploring      |
        |   the features of CineWorks.                                         |
        |                                                                      |
        |   - Video                                                            |
        |     - Acorn Replay Movie format                                      |
        |     - Sorted into subject directories                                |
        |                                                                      |
        |   - Audio                                                            |
        |     - Audio-only Acorn Replay files                                  |
        |                                                                      |
        |   - Examples                                                         |
        |     - Sample movies created using CineWorks                          |
        |                                                                      |
        |   - Extras                                                           |
        |     - Demonstration software for other Oregan products of the time   |
        |     - FLI Files (Sample AutoDesk Animator files for use in           |
        |                  CineWorks)                                          |
        |     - ARMovie system resources including 'LinePack' decompressor     |
        |                                                                      |
